Upgrade your game.

HomeCourt is the free, interactive basketball app that helps anyone get better. It’s the personal basketball trainer that’s always with you, capturing your performance, your stats, and your progress—guiding you to the next level. With HomeCourt, every rep counts. 

TRAIN SMARTER
HomeCourt captures your moves and your stats as you train—so you can see your true skill level. HomeCourt uses the camera on your device to track your performance in real-time, everything from your jump shot to your crossover. In-depth data and analytics help you break down every session. HomeCourt calculates metrics like shooting percentage, accuracy, release time, dribble speed, vertical jump and more. You can even use Apple Watch to track your heart rate and save your data to HealthKit. 

ENGAGE IN FUN, INTERACTIVE DRILLS
Using HomeCourt is less like training and more like a video game. The immersive live-action experience is powered by AR (augmented reality), with virtual targets, audio cues, bonus levels, points and badges—it’s like you’re inside the game. Now practicing skills is engaging, not boring, so you’ll stick to it and improve more. 

LEARN FROM THE PROS
HomeCourt is an official partner of the NBA and provides access to the expertise of the most elite players in the game today. Train with interactive drills and instruction from NBA and WNBA athletes. Learn their moves and even compete against them in interactive challenges. 

COMPETE WITH FRIENDS
Don’t workout alone, compete virtually with your friends, family, and teammates. You can join a virtual Team on HomeCourt, or create your own Team for free. You can also challenge a friend or teammate to any HomeCourt activity with a time-shifted “Battle Mode” that matches you up head-to-head. As you compete in Battles, you collect trophies, badges, and coins, just like you would in a video game. Earn rewards and level up together.

SHOWCASE YOUR SKILLS
Engage in unique showcase activities and even get discovered directly by the NBA. Participants who opt-in to NBA Global Scout are eligible to receive invitations to select NBA tryouts, camps, tournaments, and showcases. As you build your profile on HomeCourt, you can also share your progress with individual coaches and scouts.

--
SET UP
HomeCourt is ready to use everywhere you bring your iPhone or iPad. No special basketballs, uncomfortable sensors, or expensive equipment is required. Just set up your phone with a clear view of the court and starting training and competing through HomeCourt.

PRICING
• Free: Access the full library of 100+ drills and activities. Get unlimited shot tracking.
• HomeCourt Plus: Access your full workout history, get complete skill ratings, join the members-only training club, request feedback from HomeCourt pro trainers, participate in HomeCourt Global Camp, and create up to 4 user profiles.

HomeCourt Plus is available for subscription as either monthly or yearly auto-renewable subscriptions. Payment will be charged to your App Store account upon the expiration of the free trial period. Subscription automatically renews unless the subscription is canceled or auto-renew turned off at least 24 hours before the expiration of the free trial period or the current subscription period. Subscription may be managed and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to App Store account settings after purchase. Please visit https://www.homecourt.ai/legal/terms for the complete terms of use.

summary.label:
Golf was first introduced to Hong Kong just over 100 years ago.  The Hong Kong Golf Club is among the 100 oldest clubs in the world and golf was played in Hong Kong before any other country in the Far East.  Up to the end of the Second World War, it was mainly the interest of the expatriate population.  For the past 40 years, however, this sport has become increasingly popular amongst the local population who now form some 80% of the HKGA's database of subscribers.

The Hong Kong Golf Association (HKGA) was set up in 1968 to co-ordinate activity at a territory-wide level, such as the running of the national championships, training players and the financing of teams to participate in overseas team events.  Efforts by the HKGA to promote the need for public facilities were successful when the Tuen Mun Driving Range and the Kau Sai Chau Public Golf Course came on stream in 1995.

In recent years, participation has grown considerably.  Hong Kong now has around 1,600 junior golfers and the HKGA supports more than 100 squad members.  The level of excellence among Hong Kong’s elite teams and individuals has also improved significantly, with 20+ players currently in the world amateur golf rankings and more than 10 on college golf scholarships in the US and around the world.

The Live Soccer TV app is the iOS platform for LiveSoccerTV.com - a soccer website that provides a soccer TV guide that methodically researches and compiles international broadcast listings, soccer broadcast rights, fixtures, live scores data, and soccer news reliably since 2004.

The app offers all the essential soccer data and information you’ll need to find out when, and how to watch your favorite teams, leagues, and competitions, no matter where you are in the world. Use the comprehensive Live Soccer TV calendar with the latest league and competition fixtures to manage your viewing and stay informed. Besides listing all the legal and official verified broadcasts, you can also get all the live scores for every game, along with lineups, match stats, match events, and live text commentary. Catch up with world soccer news and trending topics covered in the news section. 

To help you watch live soccer, Live Soccer TV providers all broadcast listings across all available platforms: TV, live streaming, OTT, radio, on-demand, TV replays, and other relevant programming. You can also learn more about the channels, broadcasters, and OTT services available in your territory by accessing the channel information. Each soccer channel provides a list of the domestic TV rights by sports property and additional information about the channel such as the broadcast quality and channel providers.

Use the app to add the live match times and broadcast listings of your favorite teams and matches to your calendar to get timely reminders. Or get vital kick-off reminders from 24 hours to up to 30 mins before the game, as well as visual and audible notifications of your favorite matches at the kick-off time.

*Please note: The Live Soccer TV app does NOT provide any live streaming in the app or any linking or promotion of live or non-live matches by illegal or unofficial broadcasters, unlawful streaming, or match downloads. All links from the Live Soccer TV app are directed only to the official rights holders, the TV networks, and broadcasters. We also provide listings and links to 3rd party broadcasters that have acquired the broadcasting rights through sub-licensing deals as per the availability of such broadcasts. 

Here is a list of content and features provided by the Live Soccer TV app:

- Official TV, online & on-demand broadcast listings for most soccer leagues, cups and competitions.
- Links to official and legal live audio and video streams by region for matches in top competitions.
- Goal & News Alerts (Favorite Teams)
- Team fixtures, results, match stats, and lineups.
- League and competition standings.
- Player goalscoring and assist tables.
- Match kick-off notifications and reminders.
- Add match events and broadcast details into your calendar.
- Share match details with your friends.

- Local soccer TV broadcast rights listed by competition and channel.
